type: Tutorial Step - The Rest of the Crew!

definition.text: The rest of the layers are virtually self-explanatory once you understand the standard workings... so, I'll be brief!

paragraphs.text: Status, for nodes which have one!
Progress, for nodes that may feature an indication of progress!
Running, for nodes that are evaluated at certain points in time!
Announcements, for announcements set up at the trading system, currently broadcasted over Telegram!
Warnings, when something unusual happens but is not considered an error!
System Info, may be displayed on many nodes, sort of like a verbose mode.
